testcase.classname: To check the functionality of flipkart application

testcase.system-out: Given user is flipkart home sign on page....................................passed And user clicks close button in sign up page................................passed When user searches for "Iphone".............................................passed Then user can verify no of results coming...................................passed And verify the alternate text at iphone13...................................passed

testcase.classname: To check the functionality of flipkart application

testcase.system-out: Given user is flipkart home sign on page....................................passed And user clicks close button in sign up page................................passed When user searches for "chocolate"..........................................passed Then user can verify no of results coming...................................passed And user navigates to parent page to search.................................passed And user navigates to child webpage to search...............................passed And user is doing pagination in child page..................................passed
